title: Leaverbuster????
body: First things first, I respect riots player behavior punishment system but why am I getting 20 minute leaver buster queues for rejoining the game and playing it out?? This has happened multiple times and i do not respect that its making me wait 20 minutes for a game that I played through.

replies.body: Even when you rejoin and play out the rest of the match, if the system detects that you were afk for a certain amount of time it will flag your account. It wasn't just that one flag that put you in the LPQ, but a culmination of other recent AFK's.

Yes, but I feel like it should detect it for a longer time because most cases people have to restart their client, and the new client doesn't open as fast as the old one so it takes longer than the leaverbuster time gives you.
